# cmccloudv2_eip_port (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# attach eip with a port
resource "cmccloudv2_eip_port" "eip_port" {    
    eip_id 			= "f036e873-4579-4575-8ebc-2364a7b0e522" 
    port_id 		= "8de5d47e-ff2b-4390-8333-fbf3d775cd1a"
    fix_ip_address 	= "192.168.0.10" 
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `eip_id` (String) The ID of the EIP to attach the port to
- `port_id` (String) The ID of the port to attach the EIP to

### Optional

- `fix_ip_address` (String) The IP address of the port to attach the EIP to
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
